text: Takheun le gata ubak hamba Lon Nyang na meuiman takwa keu Allah Beu na tatakot akan Po gata Nyang got lam donya got that Neubalah Soe nyang di donya jipubuet buet got Balasan that got Neubri le Allah Lom bumoe Tuhan sit luah that-that Tasaba meuhat nyang peunteng leupah Pahla cukop that keu ureueng saba Han ek takira Neubri le Allah
